"Phantom God of Creation": "Where are we? This place is different from where we just were."
"A pleasant wind, comfortable light... This environment has no sense of realism."
"No, it does not. This is my garden. This place is too much for human senses."
"W-Who?!"
"Such an irrelevant question, child of man. You called me here, then ask who I am?"
"No way, you're..."
"Everything. I am the one who created this planet, this universe, all of creation. I am creation itself."
"So that's what Ardem meant when he said his body was a vessel for God..."
"However, the arrival of the God of Creation... what madness is this?"
"While this is an unexpected vessel, if I took shape in it, I must fufill the duty it wished of me."
"I will use this land, this planet, as materials and commence creation of a new universe."
"Using this planet as materials for creation... You'll destroy the Earth?!"
"It is the end for today's humanity, this planet, this universe. But worry not, the reborn universe will likely be carried on by a new humanity."
"A stagnant world only has worth as raw material, and if rebirth is what humanity desires... I will fufill their wish."
"I won't... let you do that!"
"You dare bare your blade at me? The God of Creation?"
"Ame-no-Murakumo... vanished? Why?!"
"Those are embodiments using fragments of myself, the universe. They are no threat to me, and will scatter according to my will. This is simply truth."
"Hm? How has your power not vanished?"
"...I see. You are a visitor from another universe, another dimension? It's no surprise you are beyond my control."
"<%me>. I thank you for your devotion to this degenerated star."
"Now, let myself, the God of Creation, take over from here. I shall kindly return you to your home."
"That... is not of our universe either. I will also return you to your home."
